text_block_list.text: It was the day of the big qualifying race. A chance for up-and-coming Uma Musume to show off their potential…
I was walking through the academy grounds on my way to the track, when…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Ah, um, excuse me? Yeah, you over there! I couldn't ask you to assist me for just a tiny second, could I?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: "Assist", exactly. Now, some people are going to come by here in a moment and when they do, I need you to tell them, "Nice Nature? Noooo, I haven't seen her all day!"

text_block_list.name: Neighborhood lady
text_block_list.text: Ah! Nay-chan! There you are, we've been looking all over for you!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Guck.

text_block_list.name: Neighborhood man
text_block_list.text: What are you doing here? We heard you were racing, but we couldn't find you at the track! We thought you'd overslept!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Aww c'mon now, would I do that!? Why, if anything I think I've been getting up earlier recently and…

text_block_list.name: Neighborhood lady
text_block_list.text: Oh, really now, Nay-chan, you sound like one of us!

text_block_list.name: Neighborhood lady
text_block_list.text: Anyway, it's the qualifying race, Nay-chan! We're all here to cheer you on! You'll do your best won't you, Nay-chan?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Uuuuhhh… I, uh, appreciate you all taking time out of your busy schedules to attend today but… I'm worried you might all be getting your hopes up a little too much…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: They might call me Nice Nature, but you've got to understand. What nature gave me just ain't that great.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: You saw my practice races, I'm a solid third place, at best. So it's probably better not to get carried away, right?

text_block_list.name: Neighborhood man
text_block_list.text: Awww, don't be so hard on yourself! Now, we're going to go down to the track and get ready. You make sure you get a proper warm up, alright!?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: A-hahaha… yes, okay, thank you…!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Oh right. Umm… sorry! I kind of left you flapping in the breeze there didn't I.
choice_data_list: Who were they? Your fan club?
Who were they? Your fan club?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: What? No! Don't be silly. They're just folks from the neighborhood. They're only here out of politeness, really.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Even so, I'm not very good at dealing with that sot of thing, sooo I thought it'd be better if I made myself scarce.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Just a sec… that badge on your collar there…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: You wouldn't happen to be one of the academy trainers, would you?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Ack! You've gotta be kidding me. Well this is awkward. I couldn't have made a worse first impression if I'd tried, could I? Yeesh. I mean, it's not that that stuff wasn't true, it's just…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Um. A-hahaha… H… hello! I'm Nice Nature! Apparently I'm running in the qualifying race today so… yeah!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Now! If you'll excuse me.
"Nice Nature"… something seemed a little odd about her, but before I could find out more, she was gone.
Soon it was time for the day's racing to begin…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Alright!! First place!!

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Tokai Teio, that was stunning! Such grace! Such agility!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Truly, it's no exaggeration to call her the "Second Coming of Symboli Rudolph"! Tokai Teio, please! Let me be your trainer!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Alright, alright! One at a time! Line up in an orderly fashion, that's right!
As the races continued, trainers scrambled to recruit the top performers.
However…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Ahh, that's Teio alright. Look at her! What a sight!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: All that talent, all that potential… and looks to go with it! She's going to be the next Symboli Rudolph… the story practically writes itself!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Yes sir, a star that bright… it almost hurts your eyes to look at her…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Yep. She really is something…

text_block_list.name: Selection Race Official A
text_block_list.text: Nice Nature, please make your way to the start.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Oops. Okay, be right there! Alright, guess I should be going.
Go, Nay-chan, go!! That's it!!!

text_block_list.name: Neighborhood lady
text_block_list.text: Come on, Nay-chan, you can do it!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Huff, huff, huff…!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: And as they come out of turn four onto the final straight, there's still no change in the lead…!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Guuh…!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: And from behind, here comes Nice Nature! Nice Nature moving up now, and that gap to the front is disappearing FAST!!
Her sudden turn of speed took me totally off guard. This girl had a heck of a finish on her!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: …but not quite fast enough! Nice Nature can't quite get there and crosses the line in third place!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Welp. There it is.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Third place. I really gave it some that time. But still… third place……
(The result might have been a little disappointing, but I knew I'd seen something special. So…)
choice_data_list: I want to be your trainer!
I want to be your trainer!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Um…… Ah…! C'mon, Trainer-san, quit fooling around! I think you'll find the line for Tokai Teio is over there.
choice_data_list: I'm not fooling around! I'm talking to you, Nice Nature!
I'm not fooling around! I'm talking to you, Nice Nature!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: W… WHAAAAT?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Wait, um, I… I mean, I couldn't possibly! I mean, I guess I could possibly… and don't get me wrong, I'm very flattered but……

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Like, I mean… are you sure? Me? If you change your mind, you just need to say the word, okay?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: But until then… I… um… I accept? I guess…?
She seemed pretty unsure about the whole thing, but nevertheless I gave Nice Nature a firm handshake and made it official.
